channel.title: Project AfterLive
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kOWIA.png[/img]
Welcome on project AfterLive.
First somethings about project AfterLive. Project AfterLive will be a server that support skilling, pking and money making. The server will be build of from a delta based server. Namely Tatemo's cleaned delta base. For client we will be using Ii Claw iI's delta client. There will be maded quests that give you rewards and i'm thinking about a quest point system.
Why are we making this? Well, mostly i'm seeing project insanity based servers. And not much delta's anymore. Also most of the servers that are online now are pk based. Mostly the skills aren't good at all. I wanna try to make this. Pk and Skills so if someone is tired of pking can get skilling and if you're tired of skilling you can go pking.
[u][b]Update log[/b][/u] [code]05/03: -Maded devolopment thread. -Added some basic skills: Thieving stalls (a few) and pickpocketing (a few). Also added basic runecrafting and basic gem crafting. -Started on lumbridge as home(this is chosen because from this town u can reach almost any other) 06/03 -Did some doors in lumbridge. If you open one there will come one that you can close -started on shops in lumbridge 07/03 -Did stairs in lumbridge castle (only one problem more: if i want to send a dialogue for up down it won't open.) -Maded bank on top of castle. [/code]
Media
[URL=http://tinypic.com/r/2it3eqc/7]Doors[/URL]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/n15fa1.jpg[/img]
^ also if someone know how i can remove the snow please let me know.
Support Do you want to support me? Add these banner to your signature. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZENnu.png[/img]
[code]http://i.imgur.com/ZENnu.png[/code]
Thanks for reading my thread. halflive9
Note: Don't mind to tell me some grammer mistakes it will make my thread alot neater.

item.title: Project AfterLive
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:9, topic:385009”]Well, I don’t know if I can count of this development to progress as much as I would want it to. Because I’ve seen a lot of failure developments including mine, and I don’t know how it would work out. However, I’m not going to be negative, I will support this project.

I will come back time to time to see if their are new updates that have been made to the server or client. So in other news, good luck with the development.[/quote]
Thank you, I will try to post soon updates and pictures.

[quote=“xx extremez xx, post:10, topic:385009”]URL=http://www.mybannermaker.com]

kOWIA.png728×90
[/URL]
2.
3.Project AfterLive
4.
5.Some things about Project AfterLive.
6.Project AfterLive will be a server that support skilling, pking and money making. The server will be built off of a Delta based server, namely Tatemo’s cleaned Delta base. We will be using Ii Claw iI’s Delta client. There will also be quests that give you rewards and I’m thinking about a quest point system.
7.
8.Why are we making this?
9.Well, mostly I’m seeing Project Insanity based servers and not many Deltas anymore. Also, most of the servers that are online now are PK based, and the skills aren’t good at all, so I decided to make a server with both PKing and Skilling, so you will never be bored!

item.title: Project AfterLive
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Well, I don’t know if I can count of this development to progress as much as I would want it to. Because I’ve seen a lot of failure developments including mine, and I don’t know how it would work out. However, I’m not going to be negative, I will support this project.

I will come back time to time to see if their are new updates that have been made to the server or client. So in other news, good luck with the development.

Read full topic

item.title: Project AfterLive

item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

kOWIA.png728×90

Welcome on project AfterLive.

First somethings about project AfterLive.
Project AfterLive will be a server that support skilling, pking and money making. The server will be build of from a delta based server. Namely Tatemo’s cleaned delta base. For client we will be using Ii Claw iI’s delta client. There will be maded quests that give you rewards and i’m thinking about a quest point system.

Why are we making this?
Well, mostly i’m seeing project insanity based servers. And not much delta’s anymore. Also most of the servers that are online now are pk based. Mostly the skills aren’t good at all. I wanna try to make this. Pk and Skills so if someone is tired of pking can get skilling and if you’re tired of skilling you can go pking.

05/03: -Maded devolopment thread. -Added some basic skills: Thieving stalls (a few) and pickpocketing (a few). If you open one there will come one that you can close -started on shops in lumbridge 07/03 -Did stairs in lumbridge castle (only one problem more: if i want to send a dialogue for up down it won't open.) -Maded bank on top of castle.
